commitResults.messageTitle: Creation of new Class - Event ( Event.java )    Consist of 2 major parameters ( activities and status ) and methods to initialize, create and access instances of this class. Feature Addition for Level-1 & Level-2 ( Duke.java )    Level-1      - Greet ( Greet user and ask for user's name )      - Echo ( Adding keyword "echo" at the front of the sentence to be echoed )      - Exit ( By saying "bye" or "that's all" )    Level-2      - Add ( Adding keyword "add" at the front of the sentence/phrase to store sentence/phrase into a To-Do List)      - List ( By saying "list" to request viewing of the To-Do List)
Level-3 Addition of Functionality : - Update task status (By adding keyword "mark" and "unmark" infront of the task index)
commitResults.messageBody:
Restructure of classes
- Entire "Event" class has been modified and renamed to "Task" class
- Addition of deadline class for future functionality

Addition of Functions
- Changed "add" to "todo" for task class
- Deadline (adding keyword "deadline" at front of task and followed by "/by" to indicate deadline for task
- Event (adding keyword "event" at front of task and followed by "/at" to indicate event period for task
- modified print function

Task & Deadline class
- Override toString()

Event class
- created and override toString()

Addition of Functionality (Duke.java)
Handling of invalid inputs
- todo (can identify missing task information)
- deadline (can identify missing task/missing deadline/ missing both information)
- event (can identify missing event/missing duration/ missing both information)
- Mark & Unmark (only numerical index )
- unknown keyword / command (will let the user know that Haro does not recognise the command)

Addition of Exception class (DukeException.java)
- Addition of class to store information of different error types
